Task - 1: login.c

Before going trying the tasks, please read this, it will help a lot.

Sidenote: The tasks are all compiled with emscripten, which takes input in a popup window before the task starts. After sending in your input, it will pop up again until you press cancel. To use it correctly, youâ€™ll need to enter your input in the first popup, and cancel the second one.

Your task here is to get the Welcome Admin! message

Open Task - 1 login.c

Hint 1 This is a simple buffer overflow, much like in a normal binary.
Hint 2 Try to overwrite the `user` variable on the stack to pass the check.
Hint 3 Man... what else is there to say?
